snippet: A Bahraini court jailed six people for a year on Wednesday for insulting King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa in messages on Twitter, the official news agency said.
abstract: Bahraini court jails six people for a year for insulting King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa in messages on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: A Bahraini court jailed six people for a year on Wednesday for insulting King Hamad bin Isa al-Khalifa in messages on Twitter, the official news agency said.

headline.seo: Bahrain: 6 Jailed for Insults to King
headline.main: Bahrain: 6 Jailed for Insults to King
